question.title: Is there a Jakarta namespace version of Apache Commons IO?
question.body: Our system uses the latest version of Apache Commons IO (2.17.0). But this version uses the javax namespace instead of Jakarta. Our system uses Spring Boot 3 and therefore requires the Jakarta namespace. So I wonder, is there a Jakarta namespace version of Apache Commons IO? If not, how can we proceed? It would take a long time to replace Apache Commons IO with another library.
